message.name: INF_CASEEVIDENCESTATUS_UNAPPROVED_OWNER_SUBJECT
message.locale: Updated evidence on case %1s of type %2s for %3s is pending approval.

message.name: INF_CASEEVIDENCESTATUS_UNAPPROVED_OWNER_REASON
message.locale: The updated evidence on case %1s of type %2s for %3s is pending approval.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCEAPPROVAL_XFV_USER_SUPERVISOR
message.locale: Only a case supervisor can approve evidence.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCEENDDATE_XFV_EVIDENCE_CHANGE_REASON_EMPTY
message.locale: Please select a Change Reason when selecting evidence to end date.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCEENDDATE_XFV_EVIDENCE_END_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Please select an End Date when selecting evidence to end date.
